name: IPV
text message: Having a loving relationship with our partner can have a big impact on how we feel. It also helps make our children feel loved and safe.

name: IPV
text message:
Here are 5 simple tips on how you can develop a loving and peaceful relationship with your partner:
  
  1. Treat each other as equals
  2. Become a confident parent and a supportive partner
  3. Share family responsibilities
  4. Resolve conflict peacefully
  5. Listen and talk to each other
  
Type "1" to "5" to learn more about these tips. Type "N" to stop this tip.

1. Treating each other as equals
2. Become a confident parent and a supportive partner
3. Share family responsibilities
4. Resolve conflict peacefully
5. Listen and talk to each other

You can also type "N" to stop this tip.

name: IPV
text message: Well done for adding another skill to your Parenting Toolkit! Over the next few days, try using some of these tips in your relationships with your partner. Having a loving relationship with your partner can have a big impact on how you feel and can also help your children feel loved and safe!

name: IPV
text message: We understand that these times can be very challenging. Please type "help" if you want any extra support or information. Chat later!
